reviews.text: Anyone who knows, this is not a wall switch to control the outlet, that is another piece of hardware, this allows you to have an outlet, where you would normally have just a switch to a light in the room. I have a small apartment bathroom, limited outlets and a space heater. I don't want the cord for the space heater coming up to the countertop, and being a trip hazard. By installing this switch + outlet equipment, I can plug the space heater in, inside the closet and the cord is now out of the way.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Combination Toggle Light Switch and Duplex Receptacle Outlet, Single Pole Toggle Wall Switch, Grounded Outlet, Combo Style, 15 Amp, Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Cheap and works. Can feed with 1 or 2 circuits, either combining or separating the switch and the receptacle feed. The light switch does NOT control the receptacle, regardless how you configure it using the included instructions. If you want to do that, you just need to break away the tab on the hot side and run your switched hot (coming OUT of the switch) as power in for the receptacle; they already share the ground and neutral so nothing changes there. If that doesn't make sense, just hire an electrician, it should take them 30 seconds to figure it out.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.title: Cheap. Works.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Combination Toggle Light Switch and Duplex Receptacle Outlet, Single Pole Toggle Wall Switch, Grounded Outlet, Combo Style, 15 Amp, Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: As stated in headline, this is a China copy of the Leviton combo switch. The switch can actually be set up in 4 different configurations, NOT just two as shown in the Bestten paperwork. If you want to know how to hook this receptacle using your normal three wire coax in, and out, where the switch ONLY controls the light, and the plug can be used any time, go to the Leviton how to on the internet. On the diagram to the left where you use just one hot and a common neutral, when switched, will turn off both the light, and the plug. If you want them to operate separately, you will have to attach your black load wire to the left top screw, and NOT the white return wire. The white return wire will only be attached to the bottom left screw via a pigtail you make via the other two white return wires from the two coax cables.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.title: Great Leviton rip off. See instructions in review.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Combination Toggle Light Switch and Duplex Receptacle Outlet, Single Pole Toggle Wall Switch, Grounded Outlet, Combo Style, 15 Amp, Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Unlike what I read on some comments, these combined switch-receptacle are very well designed and manufactured and the instructions are perfectly clear. The receptacle can be optionally fed from the same hot wire of the switch or from a different one, cutting the bridge tab, but it is always ready to use, and not as someone wrote that it comes fed through the switch. They are exactly as described and the cheapest that I found supplied complete with their wall plates, while their quality seems to be very good. Of course that I don't know how long they will last, but my first impression is that I made an excellent purchase. Out of the box I am very satisfied and gladly give this item five stars.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.title: Excellent design and well made

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Combination Toggle Light Switch and Duplex Receptacle Outlet, Single Pole Toggle Wall Switch, Grounded Outlet, Combo Style, 15 Amp, Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I ordered this switch/receptacle combo because I wanted to have an outlet near the door where the switch to my light fixture is. I have some experience with rewiring simple things and many people claimed this (and the decora version) installed easily. To my dismay, the instructions consisted of a circuit schematic with two words on it "hot" and "neutral" and an instruction to install according the diagram. After several hours of internet research I then discovered I needed to add a pigtail the neutral wires already in the box to energize the outlet. Since I didn't have any Romex wire sitting around, I had to make an additional purchase to proceed with the installation. It seems to work now, but I giving it three stars for the lack of instructions.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2020
reviews.title: Needed an extra wire to install this
